id: scenario-autonomous-entity-community-investor-scenarios-ecological-bioregional-investor receives education on bioregional ecology and sustainable economics
title: Investor receives education on bioregional ecology and sustainable economics
description: Investor receives education on bioregional ecology and sustainable economics
content:
Scenario: Investor receives education on bioregional ecology and sustainable economics
    Given most investors lack understanding of bioregional ecological systems
    And Patricia wants to make ecologically-informed investment decisions
    When investment network provides bioregional ecology education
    Then she learns about watershed dynamics, soil health, biodiversity, climate impacts
    And investment decisions are informed by ecological understanding
    And investor community develops ecological literacy and stewardship values
    And education strengthens commitment to sustainable investment
    And bioregional_elohim provides ecological education and investment guidance
